items.header: We offer you a Free Consultation!
items.body: This Free Consultation can be by phone or in person to discuss your criminal case. Feel free to call our office at 1-404-993-9172 to schedule a consultation to discuss your case with an experienced, dedicated criminal defense attorney. Our fees are reasonable, and payment plans are available. Mastercard, VISA, and American Express cards are accepted.

items.header: This is not something to wait on.
items.body: We wish to highlight the seriousness of this DUI charge and importance of speaking with an attorney dedicated to DUI defense and related charges.  Regardless of how hopeless you think your case may be, you owe it to yourself to discuss your case with an experienced DUI attorney.  We are passionate about working hard to get a favorable result in every case we take on.  Call us at 404-993-9172 now to set up an appointment at your convenience.  You have nothing to lose by calling and potentially a lot to gain.  We look forward to hearing from you and helping put your mind at some ease during this difficult time of yours.
